node.contents: @BobbyDigital the code crashes at the setting of `lng`. However, I've come to realize that neither `lng` nor `lat` is `null`, as the `if` checks for empty string (`""`) which would have caused a NPE if either of the two had been `null`. So the culprit seems to be `location`.
